ticket.subject: Kijiji export not working
ticket.text: Hi, our vehicles stopped showing up on Kijiji 2 days ago. We checked our account and everything looks fine on our end. Can you please investigate?

resolution.resolution: Issue was caused by expired API credentials. Re-authenticated the Kijiji connection and triggered a manual sync. All vehicles now appearing on Kijiji.
steps: Verified dealer's Kijiji account status - Active
Checked our system logs - Found auth error
Located expired API credentials
Re-authenticated Kijiji API connection
Triggered manual sync of all vehicles
Verified vehicles appearing on Kijiji (5 minute propagation)

ticket.subject: PBS import failing with 500 error
ticket.text: PBS inventory import has been failing for the past hour with HTTP 500 errors. Our inventory is not updating.

resolution.resolution: PBS was experiencing API rate limiting due to high traffic. Implemented retry logic with exponential backoff. Import successful after 15 minutes.
steps: Checked PBS status page - Degraded performance reported
Reviewed error logs - Confirmed 500 errors from PBS API
Contacted PBS support - Confirmed rate limiting in effect
Enabled import retry queue with backoff
Waited for PBS performance to stabilize
Retry successful - All inventory imported

ticket.subject: Pricing showing incorrectly on AutoTrader
ticket.text: Some of our vehicles are showing the wrong prices on AutoTrader. The prices in our system are correct but AutoTrader is displaying different numbers.

resolution.resolution: AutoTrader was caching old pricing data. Cleared cache on their end and triggered full re-export. Prices now correct.
steps: Verified pricing in our database - Correct
Checked last export timestamp - Recent
Reviewed export payload - Correct pricing sent
Contacted AutoTrader support
AutoTrader cleared dealer's cache
Triggered full vehicle re-export
Verified correct pricing on AutoTrader (30 min propagation)

ticket.subject: Photos missing on Facebook Marketplace
ticket.text: We uploaded new photos but they're not appearing on Facebook Marketplace. The old photos are still showing.

resolution.resolution: Facebook requires specific image dimensions. Dealer's new photos were outside accepted range. Resized images and re-uploaded successfully.
steps: Reviewed uploaded photos - Found dimension issues
Checked Facebook requirements - 600x600 to 1200x1200 pixels
Identified photos outside range
Resized images to Facebook specifications
Re-uploaded corrected images
Verified new photos appearing on Facebook Marketplace

ticket.subject: Duplicate listings appearing on Trader
ticket.text: We're seeing duplicate listings for some vehicles on Trader. Each car is showing up twice.

resolution.resolution: Dealer had duplicate VINs in their inventory system. Cleaned up duplicate entries and removed extra listings from Trader.
steps: Queried dealer's inventory - Found duplicate VINs
Verified duplicates not in our system
Confirmed issue in dealer's source system
Contacted dealer to clean up duplicates
Dealer removed duplicate inventory entries
Triggered Trader export refresh
Verified single listing per vehicle on Trader
resolution.root_cause: Duplicate VINs in dealer's inventory system
